API pyTasks¶

task¶

package.api.task.add_task(name)[source]¶

Add a task to the tasks dict.

Parameters

name (str) – The name of the task to add.

Returns

True if the tasks are saved else False.

Return type

bool

package.api.task.get_tasks()[source]¶

Get the tasks saved in the Json tasks file.

Returns

The tasks saved in the Json tasks file.

Return type

dict

package.api.task.remove_task(name)[source]¶

Remove a task from the tasks dict.

Parameters

name (str) – The name of the task to delete.

Returns

True if the tasks are saved else False.

Return type

bool

package.api.task.set_tasks_status(name, done=True)[source]¶

Set the status of the tasks.

Parameters

  • name (str) – The name of the task.

  • done (bool) – The state of the task.

Returns

True if the tasks are saved else False.

Return type

bool
